questions.question_text: Requirements should be documented in a single format throughout the project lifecycle.

answer_choices.explanation: Different stakeholders may need requirements in different formats (e.g., user stories for developers, use cases for testers, business rules for analysts).
Correct. Requirements can be represented in multiple formats to suit different audiences and purposes, as long as traceability is maintained.

questions.question_text: All requirements must be testable and verifiable.

answer_choices.explanation: Correct. Every requirement must have clear acceptance criteria to verify it has been properly implemented.
Requirements that cannot be tested or verified are ambiguous and should be refined.
